content: The troglodytes said "bridge" when one of them crossed a river, walking on the trunk of a tall tree that had fallen there by chance. Unfortunately, however, no one knows what that word was.
translations: ita:I trogloditi dicevano ponte quando uno di loro attraversava un fiume, camminando sul tronco di un alto albero caduto l√¨
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
